definition: erhua variant of 傻帽[sha3 mao4]

sentences.english: It'll make you seem needy as shit.
sentences.chinese: 那样会让你显得很傻帽。

sentences.english: PVC: The drongos at FSUW would call it the ship of fools, eh, vice-chancellor? [Laughter]
sentences.chinese: FSUW的傻帽可以叫它白痴之船，对吧，副校长？

sentences.english: Any dupe files will be deleted on sight.
sentences.chinese: 任何的傻帽儿文件将会在视力上划除。

sentences.english: ManimalGodbeast, you argue like an idiot and sexist.
sentences.chinese: 你说的就像个傻帽和性别歧视者。

sentences.english: And every time you act like a jealous idiot, you lose more of that respect.
sentences.chinese: 而每次当你象个嫉妒着的傻帽样，你会失去更多。

sentences.english: The New Year I wish you don't know, don't know you are a big silly hat.
sentences.chinese: 新年我的祝福你不知道，不知道你是个大傻帽。

sentences.english: We're all relying on you, gosling.
He was generally disliked and regarded as a pompous ass .
sentences.chinese: 他常不招人待见，而且被看作是个自负的大傻帽儿。

sentences.english: The blessing of the Spring Festival, I do not know you, you do not know is a big Shamao.
sentences.chinese: 春节我的祝福你不知道，不知道你是个大傻帽。

sentences.english: 'You probably think I'm being foolish, don't you?'
sentences.chinese: 你大概觉得我是个傻帽儿吧，对不对？

definition: erhua variant of 缺心眼[que1 xin1 yan3]
to stop one's pen/to break off writing/final remarks (at the end of a book or article)
